title: GOKATOSAU Women's Halter Deep V Neck Flowy Chiffon Bow Tie Backless Summer Mini Dress
description: Material: 90% polyester, 10% spandex.Women's flowy satin dress is well made of high quality polyester blend,which is soft and lightweight,skin-friendly,durable and not fade,smooth to touch,cozy to wear.

Feature: Step out in style with our Dress! This backless beauty has all the features you need for a night to remember: an invisible back zipper, double lining, adjustable ties, and a fitted waistband that will have you looking fire. Sexy and Feminine: This sleeveless deep v neck mini dress features a high waist wrap design that perfectly shows off your body curves. Simple Elegant: The halter bow tie and back bow tie are fashionable and cute in design, adding a sense of feminine sophistication.
Size: S=USA 4-6, M=8-10, L=12-14, XL=16-18, Size for reference only.Please try to choose a larger size when buying!

Occasion: Wear stylish A-line dresses as casual dress, layered with T-shirt is suitable for beach, picnic, weekend, homecoming or shopping. Glamorous high waist dress pair with strap heels or jewels is perfect for formal occasions like banquet, ceremony, wedding guest, cocktail, also nicely for evening out, night club, party, carnivals or dance.
Match: In the summer, pair it with flats or heels for a quick step out. When the weather cools down, pair it with a denim jacket, boots, necklace or tote for a glam look.
